Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson is out for the back-to-back games against Portland due to return to competition reconditioning.
Brandon Ingram and Trey Murphy are also out for the game.
Dejounte Murray is questionable for the Pelicans.
Jerami Grant and Matisse Thybulle are out for the Trail Blazers.
Deni Avdija and Donovan Clingan are questionable for the Trail Blazers.
